    Dream Arrows Classic

    Version: 1.5.1
    by: Vanish [More]

    Set the color, size and visibility of the minimap and world map arrows. For World of Warcraft Classic. A big THANK YOU to Pajlada for the pajminimaparrow addon which inspired this one and from which the base code started life.

    Available Commands
    /da help - show the help message listing available commands
    /da color [amethyst, aquamarine, citrine, gold, jade, obsidian, ruby, silver] - modify the color of the arrows
    /da flush - reset the arrow textures
    /da reset - reset to the addon deafults
    /da size [1-40] - modify the size of the minimap arrow (e.g. /da size 20)
    /da style [3d, arrow, hollow, orb, tear] - modify the style of the arrows
    /da wsize [1-40] - modify the size of the world map arrow (e.g. /da wsize 20)
    /da toggle [0-1] - toggle showing the world map arrow (e.g. to hide the arrow use /da toggle 0)
